desc: Specializes in commercial and semi-truck financing and loans for drivers, owner-operators, and fleets, including those with bad credit. Also offers working capital lines of credit up to $500K and construction equipment financing.

Florida-based merchant cash advance provider offering MCA financing with same-day funding. Qualifies businesses with 9+ months in operation and $150K+ annual revenue, with daily or weekly ACH repayment options.

One of the largest independent providers of asset-based financial services for small to mid-sized businesses. Based in Austin, TX, offers invoice factoring, purchase order finance, and supply chain financing with rates from 0.69% to 1.59%.
Duplicate of 1st Commercial Credit (ID 1002). Same Austin, TX-based invoice factoring and supply chain financing company offering asset-based financial services to small and mid-sized businesses.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Utah-based business funding company founded by Leo Kanell that provides 0% credit lines without collateral for startups and small businesses. Has secured over $500M in funding for thousands of clients and runs a broker/partner network.

Texas-based online small business lender that partnered with borrower networks to provide loans from $25K-$1MM at the lowest cost in the nation. Previously innovative in using network-backed lending model. May be defunct or acquired.

Brooklyn, NY-based MCA firm providing merchant cash advances, small business loans, term loans, reverse consolidation, and accounts receivable factoring. Minimum requirement of $5K/month or $60K annual gross sales.
Woodbury, NY-based merchant cash advance firm providing working capital to small and mid-sized businesses. Offers quick funding based on future revenue with no hidden fees and clear upfront terms.

Delaware-based business financing provider offering short-term and long-term loans, MCAs, equipment financing, and lines of credit. Requires minimum $15K monthly revenue, 6+ months in business, and 500+ FICO score.

Seattle, WA-based business and commercial lending company with over 5 years in the space. Provides financing for businesses and investment properties including owner and non-owner occupied properties.

Englewood, NJ-based specialty finance company focusing on medical receivables financing/factoring, asset-based business loans, and bank statement cash advances. Serves healthcare providers including doctors, hospitals, and nursing homes.
Equipment financing company specializing in equipment financing since 1995. Provides equipment leasing and financing solutions for businesses across multiple industries.
New York-based commercial financing brokerage offering commercial real estate loans, SBA loans, factoring, construction loans, hard money loans, equipment loans, and business lines of credit.
Hollis, NY-based merchant cash advance provider offering MCA amounts from $5K to $500K with fast approvals and 24-hour funding. Also actively hiring MCA sales professionals.

New York-based technology-enabled private lender founded in 2017 by David Obstfeld. Offers short-term loans up to $10M and payment processing solutions for small and medium-sized businesses with 10+ years lending experience.

Uniondale, NY-based alternative funding provider offering SBA 7(a) and 504 loans, business loans, construction loans, equipment financing, working capital, and real estate financing (fix & flip, buy & hold).
Florida-based merchant cash advance provider. Involved in MCA litigation. Limited public information available about current operations.
California-based small business funding company offering various lending products. Limited specific public information available.

Private finance company offering merchant cash advances, business term loans, and unsecured lines of credit from $50K to $10M. Claims to originate approximately $500M in loans annually with 24-hour funding.

Florida-based alternative lender offering small business loans, merchant cash advances, working capital loans, equipment financing, and business lines of credit. Provides same-day approvals and national coverage with no collateral required.

New Jersey-based lending platform offering MCAs, term loans, SBA loans, asset-based funding, equipment financing, and credit repair. Note: This is Apollo Capital Group LLC, not the global asset management firm Apollo Global Management.
New York-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances from $10K to $5M. BBB accredited since 2023 with Ben Sanders as CEO. Has facilitated investments for 500+ brands. Founded November 2022.

Glendale, CA-based Cash Flow OS with embedded finance for SMBs. Founded in 2022 by Albert Siems and Anthony Samkian. Makes B2B trade easier by providing buyers flexibility on payment timing and sellers on receiving payment.

Atlanta-based healthcare finance provider offering three products: Via (claims advance up to 50% of claim amount), Praxis (working capital up to $250K), and Curae (point-of-sale patient financing). Serving medical practices since 2009.

Fort Lee, NJ-based funding company formed in 2015 specializing in equipment financing, short/long-term business loans, invoice financing, and MCAs. Serves healthcare, construction, and restaurant industries as alternative to traditional bank financing.
MCA provider (Prosperum Capital Partners LLC dba Arsenal Funding) providing merchant funding to thousands of small businesses since 2014. Secured $16M in bank financing to grow its funding portfolio.
Woodcliff Lake, NJ-based funding platform for ISOs, funders, and merchants. Offers same-day or 24-hour funding with up to 17-point commissions. Recently launched (BBB file opened January 2026).

Staten Island, NY-based alternative banking platform specializing exclusively in merchant cash advances. Celebrates 8+ years of consistent returns for accredited lending partners, offering up to 20% per annum returns. Operates in 48 states.
Singapore-based digital banking platform (banco.com.sg). May not be in the U.S. small business lending space despite California location listing. Limited information on U.S. MCA operations.

Nashville, TN-based merchant cash advance provider (Business Cash Advance Capital Partners). Small team specializing in MCAs up to $50K. Will fund hard-to-place merchants including dealerships and construction companies.

New York-based lender offering bridge loans, hard money loans, SBA loans, and equipment loans with fast approvals and flexible terms. Not constrained by strict banking rules, uses private investor capital.

Los Angeles-based fintech lender — the nation's first licensed lender focused on the cannabis industry. Founded in 2018, backed by Snoop Dogg's Casa Verde Capital. Closed $125M credit facility. Operates across 12 regulated markets with lines of credit up to $15M.
New York-based business loan provider offering customized loan packages with competitive interest rates for small startups and established enterprises.

NYC-based revenue-based financing provider recently rebranded as BIG Funding. Co-founded by Cosmin Panait and Alexander Dillon. Requires 1+ year in business and $10K+ monthly revenue. Combines fintech tools with customer-focused service.
Santa Ana, CA-based business funding consultant streamlining the small business funding process since 2017. Helps clients build and grow businesses quickly through various financing solutions.

Plano, TX-based factoring and lending company offering invoice financing, working capital solutions, equipment loans, hard money loans, and purchase order financing. Serves manufacturing and transportation industries.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

NYC-based online business lending marketplace launched in 2010, connecting small business borrowers to lenders. Specializes in franchise financing. Acquired by ConnectOne Bancorp. Platform connects franchisors, small business owners, and lenders nationwide.

Santa Monica-based global leader in film, TV, music, and entertainment financing. Founded in 2013, deployed over $500M across 450+ media opportunities. Backed by Accord Financial (TSX:ACD). Provides senior secured loans against pre-sales, tax credits, and distribution agreements.

Chicago-based credit platform financing brick-and-mortar businesses through Repeatable Revenue Agreements (RRA). Secured $100M capital partnership with i80 Group. AI-enabled Scorecard system for underwriting. Serves food, wellness, fitness, and pet services.

Toronto-based business funding platform connecting businesses with lenders. Founded 2017, provides SMBs non-dilutive capital from $3K-$300M in 48 hours using fundability AI and multi-lender application technology. Helped deploy over $1B through lender network.

Rockville Centre, NY-based fintech specializing in structured finance for small businesses including invoice factoring and receivables financing. Established April 2022, offers same-day screening and funding for accounting, manufacturing, and construction sectors.

South Florida-based financial company founded by Ryan Shamim and Richard Torbett. Offers private lending, SBA loans, equipment funding, working capital, invoice factoring, revenue-based funding, and credit repair. No-fee model with 24-hour funding.
California-based small business lending company offering merchant cash advances and business loans. Limited public information available.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Likely duplicate of Business Capital Providers (ID 1149). Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Full-service financial firm in NYC's Financial District and one of the largest small business lending firms in the area. Offers flexible financing for cash flow, working capital, equipment, and business expansion across multiple industries.

Privately funded specialized debt fund for the cannabis/CBD industry. One of the only lenders offering fully uncollateralized working capital financing to licensed cannabis operators. Extended $100M+ to U.S. borrowers, lending $50K to $15M across all cannabis asset classes.

Service that brings funders together, offering a free platform exclusively for ISOs and agents to access a network of large and boutique funders. Users view multiple MCA offers within minutes through a funding portal.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

NYC-based lending platform with 500+ top small business lenders, lessors, and factors. For companies seeking $1M-$50M financing in the US and Canada, connects with interested lenders in as little as 1 day. Also related to CapFlow Funding Group (est. 2009), which has provided $1B+ in working capital via factoring and asset-based lending.
New Jersey-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Top MCA and small business funding company offering revenue-based financing and merchant cash advances regardless of credit score. 8+ years experience, 1,500+ businesses funded. Can fund from submission to wire in as little as 2 hours, with jumbo product up to $5M.
California-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Chicago, IL-based commercial lending firm offering non-bank lending solutions including asset-based lending, equipment financing, and working capital loans. Ranked #103 in Illinois. Funded $360M+ across 450+ transactions.

Washington DC-based working capital provider offering SBA loans ($30K-$350K), MCAs ($10K-$1M), commercial real estate loans ($75K-$5M), and debt consolidation. Most fundings within 3 days of approval.
New York-based revenue-based financing company with Gaurav Sharma as CEO. Provides MCA, term loans, and other funding solutions with same-day or 24-hour funding and hassle-free online application.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

California-based business financing provider with $100M+ in equipment purchases and business loans funded since 2002. Offers working capital loans and equipment financing with flexible credit requirements and fast approvals.
Portland-based merchant cash advance provider offering capital from $25K to $2M for equipment, infrastructure, and business growth.

New York-based merchant cash advance company. Has been subject to NY Attorney General lawsuit and court scrutiny for predatory lending practices. Operates alongside related MCA entities including NewCo Capital Group and MCA Servicing.

Manhattan-based mid-office brokerage in the MCA sector. Since 2015, provides deal placement, syndication management, and ISO support services to 120+ independent originating offices. Invested in 1,500+ businesses with $10M+ under management.

California-based provider of working capital loans, MCAs, revenue-based financing, and dental practice capital products for small and medium businesses in US and Canada. Note: California finance lender license was revoked by DFPI in April 2020.

Aventura, FL-based fintech offering three tiers: Cashera Instant ($500-$10K for gig workers), Cashera Select ($10K-$1M for small businesses via broker model), and Cashera Private Credit ($1M-$5M structured capital). Founded July 2023.
Online platform offering merchant cash advance loans to businesses. Founded in 2022 as a relatively new, unfunded startup in the MCA space.

Houston, TX-based factoring company for small to medium-sized businesses with 50+ years of combined experience. Specializes in accounts receivable financing for staffing, distribution, oilfield services, and transportation. No lock-in contracts, transparent rates.

New York-based funding company (est. Feb 2024) offering business term loans, lines of credit, and revenue-based financing. Claims $50M+ delivered to businesses with A+ BBB rating and 60-second pre-qualification. Jonathan Abraham serves as CEO.
Florida-based merchant cash advance provider. Operates using standard MCA structure purchasing future receivables from merchants. Referenced in SEC filings related to MCA agreements.

New York-based underwriting-focused company founded in 2015 providing due diligence and product development consulting for alternative SMB lending. Inc. 5000 honoree. 10-person team with 10+ years MCA experience each. Serves funders, syndication brokers, and ISOs.

Division of First Chatham Bank (Georgia) funding government-guaranteed loans through SBA and USDA platforms. Direct lender offering loans up to $5M for real estate, equipment, working capital, acquisitions, and more. 17 full-time employees, all industry veterans.

Santa Monica-based fintech investing $15K-$50K in individuals using Convertible Income Share Agreements (CISAs). Funds founders at idea stage before traction, including side hustlers and lifestyle businesses. Pioneered CISA combining features of SAFEs and ISAs.

Princeton, NJ-based MCA and small business funding company with nearly a decade of experience. Offers final approvals up to $1M and funds 1st through 6th positions. No credit check required, 3+ months in business minimum.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Franklin, TN-based Commercial Loan Brokers Association — industry trade group connecting 500+ commercial loan brokers. Co-founded by Terry Luker. Offers education, certification (Commercial Loan Broker Academy), and CONNECT marketplace for deal placement.
Florida-based small business loan provider offering term loans, working capital advances, equipment leasing, and SBA loans regardless of credit history or high-risk designation.
New York-based (99 Wall Street) MCA provider offering fast capital to businesses of all sizes across 500+ industry segments including higher-risk industries like trucking and construction.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available. Note: Coastal Capital Group (coastalcapitalgroupinc.com) is a separate entity offering MCA programs.
Texas-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

NYC-based commercial finance company (275 Madison Ave) providing working capital through accounts receivable factoring and purchase order financing. Founded 2008 by Rishi Kumar and Einat Steklov. Raised $25M from Wells Fargo. Serves tech, telecom, food, manufacturing across US and Canada.

California-based financial studio for creators (ChannelMeter, Inc.). Allows YouTube creators to cash out earnings immediately without waiting. Offers Bump Creator Credit Card and banking tools. Has paid over 1M+ creators across a decade.

NYC-based (90 Broad St) AI-driven lending platform leveraging smart automations and a comprehensive marketplace to optimize deal flow for lenders, brokers, and financial professionals. Includes iCred Capital Fund ($20M private credit fund) and Cerebro asset recovery platform.
Invoice financing and working capital provider for business owners. Offers fast processing and approval with flexible solutions tailored to business needs.

Boca Raton, FL-based provider of inventory and purchase order financing for businesses turned down by traditional lenders. Offers revolving lines of credit, PO financing (up to 100% of order), and e-commerce financing in conjunction with factoring relationships.
California-based direct funder providing capital to ISOs and brokers. Identifies as a 100% direct lender with years of experience in the MCA/funding space.

Arkansas-based software technology company (woman and veteran-owned) founded in March 2020. Flagship product Lending Leads is a relationship-based lead generation and competitive intelligence platform for banks helping them execute growth strategies and compliance goals.

Carlsbad, CA-based online direct small business lender founded in 2012. Provides flexible term loans and asset-based lines of credit with rates as low as 9.99% and terms up to 48 months. Claims APRs up to 80% lower than other alternative lenders.

Leading media publication covering non-bank finance, alternative lending, and fintech since 2010. Founded by Sean Murray. Produces news, industry rankings, and hosts events like deBanked CONNECT and Broker Fair. Not a lender — a trade media company.

New York-based alternative finance credit brokerage founded in 2008 after the financial crisis. Arranges responsible funding solutions including business loans, pension-led funding, and invoice finance for small businesses struggling to get bank loans.

New York-based hard money lender offering commercial bridge loans (8-12% rates, 3-24 month terms). Also operates a debt relief division that restructures existing MCA debt and other business obligations for small businesses.

Mexico City-based fintech (Y Combinator backed) offering corporate credit and spend management for SMBs in Mexico. Granted $90M+ in business loans/credit lines across 130K+ transactions. Acquired by neobank albo for $20M in 2023.

Rochester, NY-based digital lending platform founded in 2023 by Daniel Levine. Offers working capital financing, lines of credit, equipment financing, MCAs, term loans, and invoice factoring for small businesses.
New Jersey-based small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Lending automation software platform (not a lender) that powers loan origination from application through funding for any lending product worldwide. SOC 2 Type II certified with 99.95%+ uptime. Offers AI agent for automating routine lending tasks and no-code decision tools.

New York-based direct lending firm providing working capital to small and moderate-sized businesses. Offers immediate funding up to $1M in as little as 2 hours with same-day deposits. Also provides hard money loans for fix/flip, new construction, and commercial real estate.

Dallas, TX-based financial services firm founded in 2010 providing business loans, church loans, fix and flip loans, bridge loans, and more across all 50 states. No perfect credit or collateral required.

Chicago, IL-based financial services company specializing in commercial real estate and business financing. Offers MCAs (sell future credit card sales for cash now), SBA 7a/504 loans, and franchise financing.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available. May share website/brand with Dynamic Fundings/Financials (ID 1204).

New York-based tech-forward funding broker specializing in MCA consolidation, business funding, and flexible financing for restaurants, retail, trades, logistics, ecommerce, and professional services. Minimal documentation required.
Likely duplicate or related entity to Dynamic Financial Group (ID 1203) and Dynamic Funding (ID 1202). New York-based small business lending company. Same website domain as ID 1202.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
New Jersey-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

San Antonio, TX-based boutique growth finance company for SaaS and recurring revenue businesses. Founded in 2019 by Scaleworks. Offers revenue-based finance and fixed-term loans up to $10M with no equity taken. Customers average 38% ARR growth per year.
Georgia-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
California-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Equipment financing company providing business equipment loans and financing solutions. Helps small businesses acquire equipment through lease and loan programs.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances and business loans with fast funding and flexible terms. Streamlined application process.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Washington state-based accounts receivable factoring company providing working capital to small and mid-size businesses by funding their receivables. Assists companies across industries with expansion, payroll, and loan consolidation needs.

New York-based fintech offering SBA loans, term loans, business lines of credit, equipment financing, MCAs, and debt consolidation. Founded by technologists and financial professionals to reimagine lending for businesses of all sizes.

Charlotte, NC-based digital financing platform connecting businesses with funding options via a private lending network. Offers working capital loans, equipment financing, emergency funding, and dedicated financial advisors for startups and established businesses.

Boca Raton, FL-based full-service lender offering MCA/cash advance, equipment leasing, invoice factoring, lines of credit, SBA loans, and term loans. Rates from 6.99%, loan amounts $30K-$350K, 2-5 year terms. 50+ years combined financial experience.

Plano, TX-based business finance company offering SBA loans, term loans, business lines of credit, equipment loans/leases, working capital, and franchise financing. 100% referral-based model working through bankers and CPAs. Led by founder Lance Robinson Jr.
California-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Florida-based alternative funding company created by small business owners for small business owners. Founded by CEO Douglas Muir. Underlying assets are MCA debt, dedicated to ensuring Main Street small businesses can access growth capital.

Online accounts receivable factoring company offering up to 95% of invoice face value with approval in 24 hours and funding in 48 hours. Uses proprietary technology and OneFee factoring model with no hidden add-on charges.

Brooklyn, NY-based MCA provider (est. Oct 2021) specializing in merchant cash advances from $7,500 to $150,000 with 4-12 month terms. Also offers consolidation programs reducing daily payments by 20-50%. Same-day funding with 4-hour approval. Works through ISO network.

Atlanta-based fintech platform for production finance. Founded 2020, lends against receivables from distribution groups for film and TV productions. Closed $5M Series A and $100M credit facility. Average 11.28% return on transactions, 200% year-on-year growth. Can secure up to $20M per project.

Online lending marketplace launched in 2006 connecting business owners to lending partners. A+ BBB rated. Provides loans, leases, and lines of credit from $5K to $500K in 48 hours. Offers MCA and revenue-based advances. $1B+ in funding over 15 years.

Rochelle Park, NJ-based alternative lender offering MCAs, working capital loans, and equipment financing. Backed by National Funding strategic investment. Rapid decision-making with some approvals in minutes and same-day funding possible.
